content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.
price for decryption?
Hello, we are the sole intermediary designated by the client. Could you kindly decrypt it? May I ask the client
Hello
Yes . wait
多少
Please help provide a quotation after decryption
Please wait
OK
When can we expect the results to be available
Today or deadline tomorrow
tell price?
0.75 BTC all network
understand

We are the only decryption partner designated by the client. As the client has a relatively small scale, what is the lowest price you can accept for this? We hope to achieve cooperation between both parties as much as possible
Waiting for your reply
We set this price because we know the client is able to pay. This is a low price for this company.
Why do you say that? We are intermediaries for our clients. Could you please let us know so that we can have effective communication.
Are you all the bank deposit information of the company

Hello, it is necessary for us to tell you about the current economic situation in China. The Chinese economy has declined by 40%, and the cost and tax of enterprise employees have risen sharply, resulting in insufficient demand and causing many small companies to be unable to survive.
As the designated negotiation agency of the client, we hope that your efforts will not be in vain and that you can also help the client complete the decryption. However, the cost is really beyond the client's affordability, and we hope that you can take a step back

Yes, we have information about the finances of this company. We know for sure that this is not a large sum for them. In addition, many servers were encrypted. We will not discuss the economy of China here now. We are here only so that your client pays us and gets his data back.
Understood, as the client's agent handling this matter, could you please provide us with the account information file so that we can communicate and interact with them
Also, can we discuss the price and determine the minimum cost that can be offered
The only thing we can do is give you a discount on condition that payment is made within three days.
offer from client. they won't pay, if amount is over $10000.  consider it and reply. thank you.
Do they want to get their servers with information back?
yes. but the value of data isn't over $10000
We will wait for a better offer from you.
It's impossible. The client doesn't have that much budget, at most only $10000
You want too much, it's not a big deal
We will meet you halfway and we can close this issue for $17,000

It's not that we don't want to talk, it's that the Chinese police don't allow them to do this. They have to spend their own money to do this, and in a sense it is also subject to government supervision. The customers really don't have that much money. Do you think 10,000 US dollars is okay? We will communicate and the deal will be done quickly.
If you pay fast, 12000$ and we close this issue
$10000 pay in 48 hours. if agree, I will help both you and the client.
Tomorrow
what mean?
10000$ you need pay tomorrow , if late we come back to 12000$
$10000  pay in 36 hours.  that is the shortest time to solve this issue.

I am ready to pay today. but I also have some problems.  1: some vmdk files were encypted with suffix 907b0AeE, but a few were encrypted with suffix 907b0AeEdxN4yX1DFxh, does that mean the files with 907b0AeEdxN4yX1DFxh can't be decrypted at all?    2: $10000 for whole networks decryption means you will send all decryption tool to me, if the windows files were encrypted, could you tell me whether the windows files were encrypted?     3: when will you send decryption after payment, Does your boss work today?
Hello
This is normal. Everything is correct. After payment you will receive instructions and decryption tools
How long will you send me decryption key after payment?
Send me your btc wallet and exactly amount. I will finish payment in 2 hours.
Hi, I am waiting for your reply.
BTC - bc1qe7zlhpdjc75te4lgzfwyy3ygsnp6shdg9lrt97
0.12 BTC
according current BTC price, $10000=0.1172 btc
yes ok
paid. hash: 5f07c26f15e5205de9ceff67315b0d119bdc2febaccd3cff45bc21bdc6fa6214
here is a sample, if you need it to generate decryption tool.  thank you.
wait pls

chmod +x decrypt_ESXI_X64
./decrypt_ESXI_X64
is there a program run in windows x86?

could this decrypt_esxi_x64 run in Ubuntu system? I ran it in Ubuntu, but the sample files can't be decrypted at all. what is wrong?  Before I run it in the encrypted ESXI, I should test whether it can work well or not. Could you send Window X86 program or program could run in centos or Ubuntu.
here is the decrpt.llg  which I run in Ubuntu. please tell me how to solve it.  Is the decrypt program right?
./decrypt_ESXI_X64 -i /home/user/folder
Put the files for decryption into the folder, you do not need to specify any parameters in ESXI, it will find all the files and decrypt them

./decrypt_ESXI_X64 -i /home/user/folder   can't work in Ubuntu. no any response.  All 3 test files can't be decrypted.
should I have to run in ESXI ?
descriptor for ESXI, start it
I will reinstall a new ESXI and run this program on it. I hope you can send a program run in WINDOWS
Your locker ID belongs to ESXI, I can't give you a decryptor for WINDOWS!
You don't need to reinstall anything, just run it on the ESXI host that was encrypted and on which you took the note in order to get into this chat
Hello
